column5: I live in Verona, just north of Kingston. Have been here for 7 years. Still learning the area, but have developed some favourite spots.  Would be very interested in communicating with anyone who knows or lives in the area, especially North Frontenac. Looking to do some ice-out trout fishing this year, north of Highway 7 and looking for a roads/lakes report given the flooding and late breakup this year.  Also looking for a spot with some good pike for May.  In my immediate area, lakes are about 2 feet higher than normal, with record water levels dating back to the 1970s.  Roy
